definition: to meet again at unspecified date/meeting postponed indefinitely
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: Alucard: Farewell then. We'll not meet again.
Years later, after our life from now on.
sentences.chinese: 多年以后，从此我们后会无期。

sentences.english: Many years later, we never ever meet again.
sentences.chinese: 多年以后，从此我们后会无期。

sentences.english: I remember, one of these day, you leave, never ever meet again.
sentences.chinese: 我记得，某年某月某天，你离去，后会无期。
